TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SqlNotificationInfo extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: This enumeration provides additional information about the different notifications that can be received by the dependency event handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The SqlNotificationInfo enumeration is referenced by an instance of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationEventArgs> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo AlreadyChanged = int32(-2)

Docs.summary: The object already fired, and new commands cannot be added to it.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo Alter = int32(5)

Docs.summary: An underlying server object related to the query was modified.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo Delete = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Data was changed by a DELETE statement.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo Drop = int32(4)

Docs.summary: An underlying object related to the query was dropped.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo Error = int32(7)

Docs.summary: An internal server error occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo Expired = int32(12)

Docs.summary: The object has expired.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo Insert = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Data was changed by an INSERT statement.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo Invalid = int32(9)

Docs.summary: A statement was provided that cannot be notified (for example, an UPDATE statement).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo Isolation = int32(11)

Docs.summary: The statement was executed under an isolation mode that was not valid (for example, Snapshot).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo Merge = int32(16)

Docs.summary: Used to distinguish the server-side cause for a query notification firing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo Options = int32(10)

Docs.summary: The SET options were not set appropriately at subscription time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo PreviousFire = int32(14)

Docs.summary: A previous statement has caused query notifications to fire under the current transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo Query = int32(8)

Docs.summary: A SELECT statement that cannot be notified or was provided.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo Resource = int32(13)

Docs.summary: Fires as a result of server resource pressure.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo Restart = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The server was restarted (notifications are sent during restart.).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo TemplateLimit = int32(15)

Docs.summary: The subscribing query causes the number of templates on one of the target tables to exceed the maximum allowable limit.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo Truncate = int32(0)

Docs.summary: One or more tables were truncated.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo Unknown = int32(-1)

Docs.summary: Used when the info option sent by the server was not recognized by the client.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo Update = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Data was changed by an UPDATE statement.
